# lastPositionLatency

**Instance Property**

The time in seconds between the current and previous positions.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastPositionLatency: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property as a minimum latency value that may not include latency that accrues on the device or when it transmits the event.

## Getting the position

- **position**: The position of the switch.
- **positionDidChangeHandler**: The block that the profile calls when the value of the switch changes.
- **lastPositionTimestamp**: A timestamp for when the profile reports the last position.
